phrs.translation: n. 牛仔帽；宽边高呢帽

sentences.sentence: He was the king of the cowboys.
Boys used to play at cowboys and Indians.
sentences.translation: 男孩子们过去常玩牛仔和印第安人的游戏。

sentences.sentence: Cowboys drove covered wagons and rode horses, lassoing cattle.
sentences.translation: 牛仔们有的赶着大篷车，有的骑着马，抛套索捕牛。
